main event: Mary Elizabeth Willis reported seeing a round, dish-shaped object hovering over her home in Cleveland, Ohio on 30 August 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes, Mary described the object as a 'flying saucer' and claimed it was moving at the speed of a missile, Mrs. Willis reported the incident to the police, but they had not received any other calls, The object suddenly shot straight up and disappeared into the clouds after hovering for several minutes, The Air Force had no knowledge of the sighting.
witness description: Mary Elizabeth Willis, 57, a member of the Second Mile Baptist Church and church clerk.
